name: "Queer as Folk" Season 5--The Last One Quiz / Test | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What sport was Hunter involved in when he cut his head?
questions.explanation:
Swimming.

	Hunter was making friends and had joined the swimming team.  He cut his head during a competition and his ex-girlfriend's parents yelled for people to get out because he had AIDS.  He eventually quite school and left Michael and Ben's house to go out on his own.

questions.text: What is the name of the "proposition" that the gang is fighting to make sure doesn't get passed?
questions.explanation:
Proposition 14.

	If this proposition got passed, it would take away the rights of gay couples.  They held a fundraiser to help provide awareness to get people to vote no.

questions.text: Which of the following characters did NOT make an appearance in final season?
questions.explanation:
Ethan Gold.

	Fab Filippo played Ethan Gold, Justin's boyfriend, in season 3 of the show.  The characters Carl, Loretta, and Callie all made appearances during the last season.

questions.text: Why did Justin and Brian initially break up?
questions.correct: Brian didn't believe in marriage and monogamy
options: Justin got a job and moved to California
Justin fell in love with someone else
Brian decided that it was time to move on
questions.explanation:
Brian didn't believe in marriage and monogamy.

	Brian and Michael ended up fighting because Brian said that Michael had fooled Justin into believing that a gay couple could live together as husband and husband.  It ended up putting a major strain on Brian and Michael's relationship.

questions.text: What of the following jobs did Emmett take on during the final season?
options: "Queer Guy" for a local news station
questions.explanation:
All of these jobs.

	Emmett had a very busy life.  He did his normal catering business and then added wedding coordinator to his list.  While he was coordinating a wedding for a local TV producer, he was offered a job to be the "Queer Guy" for Pittsburgh to give fashion tips and advice on etiquette.

questions.text: Justin worked as Brian's accountant at his advertising firm, Kinnetic.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Ted was Brian's accountant.  After all of his drug problems, he got his life back together and got back into accounting.

questions.text: Which two characters were NOT in Babylon when it exploded?
questions.explanation:
Melanie and Lindsay.

	Melanie and Lindsay were late to the event so they never made it inside the building.  Justin, Emmett, and Michael were all in Babylon when the explosion went off.  Brian was on is way to Sydney, Australia when he heard about the explosion.  He headed back and found Justin and told him that he loved him and was glad he was okay.

questions.text: What was the main injury that Michael suffered from the explosion?
questions.explanation:
a hole in his spleen.

	Michael had gone up to the bar to get Ted's date a water when the explosion went off.  He was carried out on a stretcher.  Justin and Emmett stayed behind to help get people out of the club.

questions.text: What sport did Emmett's boyfriend, Drew Boyd, play?
questions.explanation:
Football.

	Drew was a big football hero in Pittsburgh.  He was outed by a man who had taken pictures of them together during an affair.

questions.text: Which popular talk show host played the role of Loretta Pye?
questions.explanation:
Rosie O'Donnell.

	Rosie played a toned down version of Debbie Novotny.  Debbie retired and Loretta took her place at the diner.  Loretta fell in love with Debbie and decided to leave town.
